Name

ppl mutt - Integration with mutt’s query_command

Synopsis

ppl mutt <query>

Description

Searches the names and email addresses in the address book for the given <query> string and returns a list of results formatted for compatibility with mutt’s query_command option.

This is intended to enable mutt users to integrate ppl as the search backend for recipient autocompletion.

Examples

Put the following in your ~/.muttrc:

set query_command = "ppl mutt '%s'"
